name: Kashif Hafeez
body:
# About Kashif Hafeez
Kashif Hafeez is a software engineer having strong SharePoint skills with K2 and Nintex along with SQL.
Kashif Hafeez has been working for mnc(Fujitsu,Imation) in Middle East specially For Health Authority Abu Dhabi as Software Engineer, and then joined Ajman Municipality for K2 and then joined DOT department of transport in Sharepoint space -I was responsible for SharePoint and SQL Server and WCMS app there.

```


```

I have completed various projects in various org but my core specialties include Sharepoint, K2, Nintex, sql, Business intelligence, document management, record management, enterprise content management, business process management.

### Academic Background
I have completed my masters though it was not in CS but I had interest in CS so from beginning I was into it and completed my diploma in CS and then some courses from Singapore specially Sharepoint, K2, Document Management, Record management and enterprise management and business process management.

### Certification
I have completed various certifications but few are here
MCSD (Microsoft Certified Solution Developer)
MCP (Microsoft Certified Professional)
MCTS Sharepoint certification
I also have completed IELTS Certification with 6.0 average band.


### Conducted Training
I also train people when I have time- training is my passion - I have conducted some training sessions for Microsoft Academia.
And Also conducted SharePoint training and other Microsoft tools and technologies training.

I also spend my time in seo, adobe and technical writing,

I have jquery repository and sharepoint repository here.
